content: I think I'll try out Todoist for task management. I've heard great things about it, and it seems like a great tool for breaking down larger projects into smaller, manageable tasks. Since I'm already using Google Calendar for scheduling, I think Todoist will complement it nicely. By the way, speaking of scheduling, I'm planning a trip to the Great Ocean Road soon. Have you heard about it? I've heard it's a must-see in Australia.
